description: Pikachu, an Electric-type Pokémon known for its yellow fur and ability to generate electricity.
Charizard, a Fire/Flying-type Pokémon that resembles a dragon and can breathe fire.
Bulbasaur, a Grass/Poison-type Pokémon that has a plant bulb on its back which grows into a large plant.
Squirtle, a Water-type Pokémon resembling a small turtle, known for its powerful water attacks.
Jigglypuff, a Normal/Fairy-type Pokémon known for its singing ability that can put others to sleep.
Eevee, a Normal-type Pokémon with the unique ability to evolve into various forms depending on the conditions.
Snorlax, a Normal-type Pokémon known for its large size and constant sleeping habits.
Mewtwo, a Psychic-type legendary Pokémon created through genetic manipulation.
Gengar, a Ghost/Poison-type Pokémon known for its mischievous nature and ability to phase through objects.
Lucario, a Fighting/Steel-type Pokémon known for its aura-sensing abilities and strong combat skills.
